body:
The [autodiff](https://github.com/autodiff/autodiff) and [vecmem](https://github.com/acts-project/vecmem) packages are standalone packages that are [bundled](https://github.com/acts-project/acts/tree/main/thirdparty/autodiff) [with](https://github.com/acts-project/acts/tree/main/thirdparty/vecmem) acts. This turns them into independent packages and includes them as dependencies of acts.

@HadrienG2 Since these are primary dependencies of acts, I have taken the liberty of adding you to the maintainer list as well.

Comments:
- I have no GPU infrastructure to test vecmem on.
- While autodiff is fairly mature and an explicit version dependence has always been present in acts, for vecmem that is a bit murkier.

TODO:
- [x] Remove some of the initial versions so only the last point releases for autodiff 0.5 and 0.6 are present.
- [ ] Determine which versions of vecmem are actually needed for which acts version
title: [WIP] [acts] new dependency packages added: vecmem, autodiff
